data.message: I dont like the new layout, the older one was better and more easy. We don't care about technology, so please give us the solution for return in back. If you don't, more persons going to delete their account. We should be to have the CHOICE!!! PS: the "help" is useless!!!! No answers.....

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Marjorie. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone's Facebook experience. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1fxgLa5 - Kristen
I agree - I HATE the new layout - did not ask for it but got it anyway.
Couldn't agree more. The new layout is so awful.

please ,i have a problem with  face book ....i have written sentences on the news feed,no posts to show find friends....and so,i  can not enjoy with recent news ..what can i do to repair this problem? please help me.
Yup, darker shade of gray on half the screen, ugly boxes AND Times New Roman font. *dies* Gimme back my old layout.
how to go on older version ?? this one new  is one step backword
